message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product and I think it would be perfect for you! My asking price is $11,500. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion. I am willing to pay $10,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm hoping for a bit more. How about $11,000?  It's a fair price considering the value you'll get from this product.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am comfortable paying $10,500 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm still hoping for a bit more. $10,750 is my final offer.  I believe it's a fair price considering the value you'll get from this product.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering the product's value, I am willing to pay $10,600 for it.
